nodes.text: Felucian Sanctuary was a village on the planet Felucia.

The village was located deep in the Felucian jungle, where it was hidden from the Galactic Empire. It was home to a group of Felucians and following the end of the Clone Wars, the former mercenary Vazus Mandrake went there to live with them. When a group of Alderaanian Resistance agents traveled to Felucia in about 19 BBY, they visited the village.
